patthana16.84:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana16.84:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappītiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
